entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
